title: BigQuery Data Transfer
description: Schedule queries or transfer external data from SaaS applications to Google BigQuery on a regular basis.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.title: Returns information about the particular transfer run.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.description: Returns information about the particular transfer run.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.title:
Updates a data transfer configuration.
All fields must be set, even if they are not updated.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.description:
Updates a data transfer configuration.
All fields must be set, even if they are not updated.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_locations_.title: Lists information about the supported locations for this service.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_locations_.description: Lists information about the supported locations for this service.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_dataSource.title:
Returns true if valid credentials exist for the given data source and
requesting user.
Some data sources doesn't support service account, so we need to talk to
them on behalf of the end user. This API just checks whether we have OAuth
token for the particular user, which is a pre-requisite before user can
create a transfer config.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_dataSource.description:
Returns true if valid credentials exist for the given data source and
requesting user.
Some data sources doesn't support service account, so we need to talk to
them on behalf of the end user. This API just checks whether we have OAuth
token for the particular user, which is a pre-requisite before user can
create a transfer config.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_dataSource.title:
Lists supported data sources and returns their settings,
which can be used for UI rendering.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_dataSource.description:
Lists supported data sources and returns their settings,
which can be used for UI rendering.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.title: Returns information about running and completed jobs.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.description: Returns information about running and completed jobs.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.title: Returns information about all data transfers in the project.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.description: Returns information about all data transfers in the project.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.title: Creates a new data transfer configuration.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.description: Creates a new data transfer configuration.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.title: Returns user facing log messages for the data transfer run.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.description: Returns user facing log messages for the data transfer run.

bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.title:
Creates transfer runs for a time range [start_time, end_time].
For each date - or whatever granularity the data source supports - in the
range, one transfer run is created.
Note that runs are created per UTC time in the time range.
bigquerydatatransfer_projects_transferCo.description:
Creates transfer runs for a time range [start_time, end_time].
For each date - or whatever granularity the data source supports - in the
range, one transfer run is created.
Note that runs are created per UTC time in the time range.
